description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller with several endpoints including a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that provides basic endpoints for greeting, API documentation redirection, health checking, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects request to the Swagger UI page, building the URL based on the incoming request data.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple health status string 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
